name: 王謹誠
objective:
本課程介紹了流體力學。 它強調了應用於流體機械系統的基本工程科學原理。學生將學習粘性和非粘性流體的控制積分和微分方程，並將這些方程應用於內部和外部流動。
This course provides an introduction to fluid mechanics. It stresses fundamental engineering science principles applied to fluid mechanical systems. Students will learn the governing integral and differential equations for viscous and inviscid fluids and will apply these equations to internal and external flows.
schedule:
第 01 週 CFD basics and ANSYS Fluent Introduction
第 02 週 Fundamental concepts
第 03 週 Pressure and fluid statics
第 04 週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第 05 週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第 06 週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第 07 週 Differential analysis of fluid motion
第 08 週 Differential analysis of fluid motion
第 09 週 Midterm 期中報告
第 10 週 Incompressible inviscid flow
第 11 週 Dimensional analysis and similarity
第 12 週 Dimensional analysis and similarity
第 13 週 Internal incompressible viscous flow
第 14 週 Internal incompressible viscous flow
第 15 週 External incompressible viscous flow
第 16 週 External incompressible viscous flow
第 17 週 Compressible flow
第 18 週 Final 期末報告
